dcterms:creator: E. M. Izhikevich
dcterms:description: The Morris-Lecar model is a mathematical model used to describe the dynamics of bursting in neurons, particularly focusing on the calcium conductance and its role in neuronal excitability.
dcterms:title: Morris-Lecar model

dcterms:creator: H. Shouval
S. Wang
G. Wittenberg
dcterms:description: Spike-timing-dependent plasticity (STDP) is a biological process that adjusts the strength of synapses based on the timing of spikes from pre-synaptic and post-synaptic neurons, crucial for learning and memory.
dcterms:title: Spike-timing-dependent plasticity (STDP)

dcterms:creator: B. Hellwig
dcterms:description: The calcium-mediated neural network dataset provides insights into the local connectivity between pyramidal neurons in the rat visual cortex, focusing on how calcium channels influence network dynamics.
dcterms:title: Calcium-mediated neural network

dcterms:creator: J. Pham
K. Pakdaman
J.-F. Vibert
dcterms:description: The dataset on randomly connected neural networks explores the effects of noise on coherence and oscillations within a network of neurons with random synaptic connections.
dcterms:title: Randomly connected neural networks

dcterms:creator: A. V. Andreev
V. V. Makarov
A. E. Runnova
A. N. Pisarchik
A. E. Hramov
dcterms:description: Globally coupled networks dataset investigates coherence resonance in stimulated neuronal networks, focusing on how global coupling affects network dynamics.
dcterms:title: Globally coupled networks

dcterms:creator: H. Takano
M. McCartney
P. I. Ortinski
C. Yue
M. E. Putt
D. A. Coulter
dcterms:description: Calcium imaging studies provide data on the contributions of deterministic and stochastic processes to synchronous bursts in CA3 networks, highlighting the role of calcium in network dynamics.
dcterms:title: Calcium imaging studies

dcterms:creator: H. Gang
T. Ditzinger
C.-Z. Ning
H. Haken
dcterms:description: The stochastic resonance dataset explores the phenomenon of stochastic resonance in excitable systems without external periodic forces, providing insights into noise-induced coherence.
dcterms:title: Stochastic resonance

dcterms:creator: S. R. Schultz
dcterms:description: The signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) dataset provides insights into the measurement of SNR in neuroscience, focusing on its implications for neural communication and information processing.
dcterms:title: Signal-to-noise ratio (SNR)
